# hw_dogtreat (Resource)

A special resource that rewards good behavior! Demonstrates conditional logic and computed attributes based on boolean values. The size of the treat depends entirely on whether the dog has been good.

*Wagging tail awaits,*
*Good dogs get the bigger treat,*
*Joy in every bite.*



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `is_good_dog` (Boolean) Whether the dog is a good dog. If true, the treat will be large; if false, it will be small.

### Optional

- `description` (String) A description of the dog treat resource

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Dog treat identifier
- `price` (Number) The price of the dog treat in dollars (large: $2.00, small: $1.00)
- `size` (String) The size of the treat (large or small), determined by is_good_dog
